item.title: #TIL : Grep : find a string in folder
item.description: Grep : find a string in folder Grep is a greate tool for searching a string in files. Syntax $ grep -nr '[string]' [folder] If you want to show surrounding lines the result, add flag -C [number] to the command $ grep -nr -C 3 'hello' src
